Dia tidak boleh mengawal penyakit itu sehingga sering pengsan apabila dihampiri perempuan. Baning membuat keputusan untuk mendapatkan rawatan di Kuala Lumpur. Menurut dari seorang pakar yang merawatnya, penyakitnya boleh sembuh dengan sendiri apabila dia bertemu jodoh dengan seorang perempuan. Apabila pulang ke Singapura, Baning berkenalan dengan seorang doktor wanita dan penyakitnya mulai sembuh. Namun begitu, malang pula yang menimpa dirinya apabila dia dituduh menjadi seorang pembunuh. Apakah yang akan terjadi kepada dirinya?

programme.title: Masuk Angin Keluar Asap
programme.desc: Wahid, seorang naib penghulu di sebuah kampung dicintai seorang wanita kaya bernama Aini, namun dia tidak mencintai wanita itu. Pada suatu hari, Wahid telah membuat dua orang kaya: Mak Siti dan Pak Rahman bergaduh akibat perselisihan faham. Dalam masa yang sama, anak Mak Siti bernama Yusof telah lama menjalinkan hubungan dengan anak dara Pak Rahman bernama Fatimah. Pak Rahman ingin mengahwinkan anaknya dengan Wahid dan menolak pinangan Yusof. Setelah pinangannya ditolak, Yusof membawa lari Fatimah untuk bernikah di rumah imam.

programme.title: Matahari
programme.desc: Tentera Jepun mula menjajah Tanah Melayu pada tahun 1942. Keadaan bertambah parah apabila ada dalam orang kampung yang menjadi tali barut Jepun. Ramai orang kampung telah dibunuh, termasuklah penghulunya kerana enggan memberi kerjasama kepada tentera Jepun. Dalam kekalutan itu, muncul seorang gadis bernama Matahari yang memimpin sekumpulan orang kampung untuk berjuang mempertahankan tanah airnya daripada terus dijajah.

programme.title: Neracha
programme.desc: Akibat kesempitan hidup, Rahman terpaksa mencuri wang di tempat kerjanya untuk menampung kos rawatan anaknya yang sedang sakit. Dia menjadi buruan polis dan telah melarikan diri ke Pahang. Ketika berada di Pahang, Rahman telah disalah anggap sebagai Husin, adik kepada orang kaya yang menghilangkan diri kerana bergaduh dengan abangnya. Peluang keemasan ini diambil oleh Rahman untuk menyamar sebagai adik orang kaya itu, namun isteri dan anaknya masih berharap agar dia pulang dan menyerah diri kepada pihak polis.

programme.title: Pilih Menantu
programme.desc: Aziz dan Zain masing-masing bekerja sebagai pemandu dan pembantu rumah dengan seorang hartawan bernama Ahmad Nisfu. Ketika majikan tiada di rumah, mereka berdua telah mengambil kesempatan untuk menyamar sebagai anak orang kaya. Mereka berdua berkenalan dengan dua orang gadis bernama Nona dan Noni lalu jatuh cinta. Apabila Ahmad Nisfu pulang ke rumah, pelbagai kekalutan berlaku kepada Aziz dan Zain. Dapatkah mereka menutup rahsia serta berkahwin dengan Nona dan Noni?

programme.title: Mambang Moden
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kehidupan sekumpulan anak muda yang aktif dalam seni persembahan. Anuar, seorang biduan ternama jatuh cinta dengan seorang janda muda bernama Haslin yang belajar menyanyi dengannya. Pada masa yang sama, muncul seorang lelaki misteri bernama Herman yang sering mengekori mereka berdua. Herman mengugut Haslin agar meninggalkan Anuar dan berkahwin dengannya atau rahsianya terbongkar.

programme.title: Ribut
programme.desc: Seorang hartawan di sebuah kampung bernama Ismail adalah lelaki yang bermata keranjang. Dia suka mengambil anak-anak gadis kampung untuk dijadikan isterinya dengan bantuan Yusof. Pada suatu hari, dia ternampak seorang gadis bernama Minah lalu ingin berkahwin dengannya. Perkara ini tidak disenangi Husin, kekasih Minah. Ismail melihat Husin sebagai batu penghalang pada kehendaknya, lalu dia merancang sesuatu untuk menyingkirkan Husin daripada kampung itu.

programme.title: Dosa Wanita
programme.desc: Perkahwinan antara Dubas Kassim dengan Zainab tidak mendapat restu daripada ibunya, Mak Wan. Walaupun sudah memiliki seorang anak, Mak Wan masih tidak boleh menerima Zainab sebagai menantunya. Oleh sebab Dubas sering belayar ke Indonesia atas urusan kerja, rakannya Johar sering mengambil kesempatan untuk berhubung dengan Zainab sehingga hubungan itu diketahui Mak Wan. Mak Wan mengambil kesempatan untuk mengugut Zainab agar meninggalkan anak dan suaminya sekiranya dia tak mahu rahsianya terbongkar. Zainab telah dihalau oleh Mak Wan dan memisahkan Zainab daripada anaknya yang masih kecil.

programme.title: Saudagar Minyak Urat
programme.desc: Kehidupan seharian Yusof, sorang lelaki miang sering dikawal oleh isterinya. Untuk mengelakkan pertengkaran, Yusof akan berpura-pura kaku apabila isterinya itu membebel. Isterinya meminta nasihat seorang penipu untuk memastikan Yusof patuh kepada arahannya. Yusof pula bertindak balas dengan mengupah seorang bomoh untuk menundukkan isterinya. Pelbagai kekalutan berlaku antara mereka berdua.

programme.title: Jurang Bahaya
programme.desc: Seorang penyanyi kelab malam bernama Xhiang Xhiang disyaki telah diculik. Jefri Zain dengan bantuan Ai Si pergi menyiasat ke mana hilangnya Xhiang Xhiang. Mereka mengesyaki kakak Xhiang Xhiang telah menyembunyikan adiknya kerana dia terlibat dengan pertubuhan rahsia. Dapatkah Jefri Zain dan Ai Si merungkai segala kegiatan pertubuhan rahsia itu serta menyelamatkan Xhiang Xhiang daripada bahaya?

programme.title: Ribut
programme.desc: Seorang hartawan di sebuah kampung bernama Ismail adalah lelaki yang bermata keranjang. Dia suka mengambil anak-anak gadis kampung untuk dijadikan isterinya dengan bantuan Yusof. programme.title: Kechewa
programme.desc: Rafeah, seorang penyanyi terkenal di sebuah restoran, menceritakan kisah tragis penjaga zaman kanak-kanaknya yang bertukar menjadi ibu angkatnya, Kesuma. Dalam cerita itu, Rafeah menceritakan bagaimana Kesuma datang untuk tinggal bersama keluarganya. Kehadiran Kesuma tidak disenangi oleh ibu Rafeah yang tidak berperikemanusiaan. Kerana jijik dengan cara isterinya itu, bapa Rafeah akhirnya jatuh cinta kepada Kesuma yang baik hati, namun hubungan mereka ditakdirkan penuh dengan kesukaran.

programme.title: Siapa Besar
programme.desc: Busu dan Hitam masing-masing tinggal berjiran di sebuah kawasan perumahan. Pada mulanya mereka hidup aman damai, namun lama kelamaan hubungan baik itu menjadi keruh akibat terlalu menurut kehendak isteri masing-masing. Busu dan Hitam terpaksa berlakon saling membenci antara satu sama lain, namun mengekalkan persahabatan di belakang isteri mereka. Tanpa disedari anak mereka pula jatuh cinta dan mencari cara bagaimana ingin mendamaikan keadaan.

Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep210
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Derita Gadis Batik Setelah Dicintai Anak
programme.desc: Kinarsih adalah pekerja terbaik di studio batik Tuan Puteri, sehinggalah pada suatu hari Bagus jatuh hati kepada Kinarsih, menyebabkan segalanya berubah. Tuan Puteri mula menzalimi Kinarsih. Akankah cinta antara Kinarsih dan Bagus tetap bersatu?

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep26
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV Ep9
programme.desc: SCTV ke-32 tahun menghiburkan rakyat Indonesia. Dalam sambutan ulang tahun SCTV yang ke-32 pada tahun ini, SCTV mempersembahkan pelbagai hiburan yang menyeronokkan dan bermutu tinggi.

programme.title: Qari Cilik Ep7
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep22
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep27

programme.title: Jodoh Gak Seprofesi I'm Not Father
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang seorang gadis cantik yang gemar muzik dangdut dan suka membuat kandungan langsung, namanya Lena. Di sisi lain, ada seorang penjual bakso tampan yang gemar tarian K-Pop yang bernama Juna. Diceritakan bahawa ketika Juna dan Lena bersiaran langsung bersama, mereka berakhir bertengkar kerana merasa saling terganggu. Mereka berdua tidak ambil peduli, walaupun ada yang mencadangkan mereka berkolaborasi. Namun, akhirnya, mereka benar-benar mula bekerjasama dalam kandungan untuk meningkatkan pengikut dan populariti mereka.

programme.title: Mendang Mending Tar Bilek Lagi
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang sepasang kekasih bernama Sam dan Alea yang dahulu semasa di sekolah menengah pernah berpacaran tetapi akhirnya putus. Sejak kebelakangan ini, mereka menjadi rapat kembali kerana mereka sama-sama merasa tidak sesuai dengan pasangan mereka sekarang. Jadi, bagaimana kisahnya apabila mereka dipertemukan kembali?

programme.title: Penjual Seblak Ceker Yang Sukses Setelah Dihantam Badai Ujian Yang Menimpanya
programme.desc: Fatur terpaksa berhempas pulas dari awal lagi dalam menjual seblak keluarga mereka setelah difitnah menjual seblak cakar busuk kerana disabotaj oleh adik suaminya. Berjayakah Fatur mengembalikan kepercayaan orang ramai?

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep7
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Sejauh Ini Yang Paling Jauh Adalah Nyariin Kamu
programme.desc: Luna dijodohkan oleh ibunya dengan seorang lelaki kaya dan posesif bernama Baim. Luna, yang menolak perjodohan itu dengan tegas, menunjukkan ketidakpuasan hatinya terhadap Baim di hadapan ibunya. Suatu hari, Luna nekad melarikan diri dari rumahnya dan tanpa sengaja masuk ke dalam kereta milik Akbar.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep212
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Our Season
programme.desc: Bok-Ja passed away. She receives a vacation from heaven and can be back to earth for 3 days. Bok-Ja looks after her daughter Jin-Joo, who can feel Bok-Ja is hovering around her.

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: A disgraced Korean researcher claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as "Nobleman"...

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: The King
programme.desc: Believing power is paramount, Tae-soo aspires to become a prosecutor. As he achieves his goal and rises swiftly to power, he also sees the cruelty of a life at the top hierarchy in 90's Korea.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: A young couple moves back to their hometown in hopes of starting a family. But when dark memories from their past begin to surface, strange things begin to happen in their house.

programme.title: The Moon
programme.desc: An astronaut is left stranded in space because of an accident during a spaceflight. The former director of the space centre strives to bring him home safely...

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as "Nobleman"...

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep92
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4916
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2218
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3850
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Walker Fun Kaohsiung (M) Ep214215
programme.desc: Walker Fun Kaohsiung is a travel reality show that takes viewers on an exciting journey through the vibrant city of Kaohsiung. With 35 different routes, the show explores the citys hidden gems, local culture, and unique experiences. From bustling night markets to serene temples, Walker Fun Kaohsiung showcases the best of Kaohsiung.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep18
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep299300
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep629
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep954
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: My Hero, My Daddy (M) Ep2930
programme.desc: A fathers love for his daughters landed Jinfa Huang in battles against other men right within his family, as he found himself in conflict with his sons-in-law. His 3 daughters each possessed a distinct personality but were similarly headstrong and in romantic relationships that caused their fathers brows to crease. Tianlan, his eldest, was in love with Minglu Xu, Jinfas superior who never missed an opportunity to make life difficult for him; Tianhong, his second daughter, was drifting apart from him because of her husband; meanwhile, his youngest girl was challenging the taboo of a campus romance. How would Jinfa emerge victor in this fight to protect the 3 loves of his life?

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep61
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep954955
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep731
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep506
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep5051
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his fathers serious illness.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Shining for One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the college entrance exam, but an accident changes everything tragically. As Zhang feels helpless and devastated, he fortuitously travels back in time with Lin Bei Xing before the accident happens. Can he make amends and convey his regrets this time?

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Love is the only Answer
programme.desc: At BO (Charmaine Sheh) and CHEONG (Alex Fong) wedding reception, the projected was initially showing their journey of love, but suddenly a flash of a clip of CHEONG and a sexy girl being intimate came up. BO calmly ran up to the stage and announced that the wedding is cancelled. The incident rapidly became a hot topic on the internet. Within a year, back to being single again, BO and the living life happily CHEONG maintains a good relationship. One day, CHEONG decided to play with love and took BO to participate in a swinging party. The conservative BO initially wanted to leave, but after being bribed by CHEONG, she helpless and stayed. At the swinging party, the two encounter KIT (Him Law) and his wife MAN LAI (Kelly Fu). The 4 of them develop a romantic and hot relationship... At another wedding reception, when th projector plays the groom (Jason Chan) and bride (Rose Chan)'s heartwarming clips, a flash of another clip that does not want to be seen comes up...

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: An ordinary, cheerful and kind-hearted girl Bao, meets a troubled rich guy Edward by chance one summer. To ruin his fathers remarriage plans, Edward hires Bao and her friend to sabotage the wedding and that is how Bao and Edward meet and fall in love. All seems well for the sweet couple until their love quickly takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxus enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld Kings sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Hex After Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chiefs illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his fathers death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Diary Of A Lady-Killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Lis wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Lis Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mothers death a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: The Mirror And The Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Buddha'S Palm
programme.desc: Young Long Jian Fei, a martial arts novice, is adopted by the Fire Spirit Demon who taught him the powerful Buddha's Palm, turning Long into a martial arts master. Long is tasked by the Fire Spirit Demon to takes revenge for his master, and this soon unleashes a storm upon the martial arts world

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: Till The End Of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 16
programme.desc: Sal, Joe, Murr and Q get snap happy while posing as photographers, then ask strangers for help filling out forms. And all but one of the guys are faced with a punishment that's not child's play.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 17
programme.desc: Q, Murr, Sal and Joe share some TMI texts with strangers, then try to sabotage each other at a dating event. And the big loser gets a special donation from one of the other guys - that he must sport for the rest of the season.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 18
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q and Murr cruise the food court sending texts to strangers, then throw caution (and groceries) to the wind. And this episode's loser is cast as a genie in a play but wishes he could be anywhere else.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 19
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Joe and Murr must explain why they've suddenly been doused with water while working at the mall. Plus, the big loser gets decked out as a pirate but won't find any rum in his cup as he entertains kids set on mutiny.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 2
programme.desc: Posing as a cashier, Michael makes a shopper's face appear on a milk carton and tries to convince her that she really is a missing person. Then, in a shipping store he has customers believing that impossible technology of the future has arrived, likea bowling ball that can be mailed in a flat box. Plus, he has a hotel guest questioning her identity when he swaps her ID, and stumps a valet when he does a disappearing act from his car.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 3
programme.desc: Posing as a thrift store employee, Michael makes shoppers believe that a real waddling duck is just a lifelike decoy, and confuses clerks with a never-ending chain of hangers. Then, he convinces liquor store customers that some corks are made of cheese and a wine can freeze on command. Plus, in a museum he shocks a gullible new employee by destroying a priceless piece then impossibly reconstructing it.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 5
programme.desc: Michael convinces customers to buy toys that couldn't possibly exist, like bubbles that turn into Christmas ornaments when you catch them. Then, as a personal trainer, he makes a client think he actually sweat enough to fill a bucket. Plus, a security guard panics when Michael makes a car disappear on his watch.

programme.title: Friends S3 16
programme.desc: When Rachel discovers that Ross slept with Chloe, she decides to break up with him. Second of a two-part episode.

programme.title: Friends S3 17
programme.desc: A lonely Ross visits Carol when Rachel goes on a ski trip with some friends.

programme.title: Friends S3 18
programme.desc: Phoebe is distraught when her brother wants to marry a woman twice his age. While working as a waitress, Monica gets a tip from an admirer worth a small fortune.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

Hero is a word we often hear in the world of sports, but heroism is not always about achievements on the field of play. 42 tells the story of two men -- the great Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) and the legendary Brooklyn Dodgers manager Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford) -- whose brave stand against prejudice forever changed the world by changing the game of baseball. In 1946, Rickey signed Robinson to the team, breaking Major League Baseball's infamous color line. Facing racism from every side, Robinson demonstrated tremendous courage by letting his talent on the field do the talking -- ultimately winning over fans and his teammates, and paving the way for others to follow.

programme.desc: I Would Gift You The Sky - With the end of the school year approaching, Izumi reflects on how his life has changed because of small coincidences.

programme.title: The Day I Became A God Ep1
programme.desc: The Day A God Descended - Yota encounters a girl called Hina who claims she is a god called Odin and that the world is ending in 30 days.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Made In America - Each chef must select two different boxes, each representing a state and its local ingredients, and then create one inventive fusion dish.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Finale - In the second half of the finale, the final three chefs must create one dish on each level of the kitchen in just 90 minutes. It is up to the chefs to determine how much time they use on the bottom and middle levels, which will determine how much time they have to make their final dish on the top level. Eighteen chefs began the journey, three will cook in the finale, and only one will win the one-year mentorship, $250,000 and the title of Next Level Chef.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S11 Ep110
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S11 Ep160
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Marry Me
programme.desc: A betrayed pop star (Jennifer Lopez), slated to marry her pop star fianc (Maluma) on stage, instead marries a stranger from the audience - a high school math teacher (Owen Wilson).

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Surf And Turf - The chefs are asked to reimagine an old classic -- surf and turf; the remaining contestants are judged on their interpretation of a land and sea animal that puts a new, exciting twist on a familiar favourite.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Made In America - Each chef must select two different boxes, each representing a state and its local ingredients, and then create one inventive fusion dish.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Finale - In the second half of the finale, the final three chefs must create one dish on each level of the kitchen in just 90 minutes. It is up to the chefs to determine how much time they use on the bottom and middle levels, which will determine how much time they have to make their final dish on the top level. Eighteen chefs began the journey, three will cook in the finale, and only one will win the one-year mentorship, $250,000 and the title of Next Level Chef.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The journey begins as 12 dance teams, each comprised of one extremely talented kid dancer and their untrained parent, enter the competition of a lifetime on the two-hour series premiere.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep2
programme.desc: Pop Night - After Maceos dad, Albert, injured himself in the premiere episode, host Philip Lawrence declared all 12 teams safe from elimination, making this weeks Pop Night the first emotional goodbye of the season.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep3
programme.desc: Bust A Groove Night, Part 1 - The stakes are at an all-time high when each kid is tasked with teaching their parent three dance moves that they must incorporate into their performance.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep4
programme.desc: Bust A Groove Night, Part 2 - The second wave of five kids tasks their dance partners with learning three new moves that they must pull off during their performances. The five remaining teams perform dance routines on part two of a two-part episode.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep5
programme.desc: Picture This - Emotions are at an all-time high as each team performs a routine inspired by a photo that represents their relationship.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep6
programme.desc: #Throwback - Each of the final eight teams chooses their favorite era to inspire the creation of an original performance. From ancient Egypt through present day, teams are pushed out of their comfort zones as they perform routines to songs.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep7
programme.desc: Musical Magic - Drawing inspiration from their favorite musicals, each dance team is faced with the daunting task of showcasing their theatrical skills. Seven parent-kid teams remain in the competition as they perform dance routines to hit musical songs.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep8
programme.desc: Jet Setters - Six teams perform dances inspired by their dream destinations, and one team makes history when they receive the first-ever perfect score in the competition.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep9
programme.desc: Heroes Night - Each team is tasked with creating their own superhero power as they battle their way through difficult dance routines, in hopes of advancing to the semi-final. The talented kids and their untrained parents perform routines to hits.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep10
programme.desc: Semi-Final - The four remaining teams dance not once, but twice to prove they have what it takes to advance to the grand finale. The final four perform routines to top songs.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep11
programme.desc: Grand Finale - The judges and choreographers kick off the shows season finale with an epic dance, then the three final kid-parent teams perform encores of the judges favorite routines from the season with the winning duo taking home the $100,000 grand prize!

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep20
programme.desc: Cleveland - Liz (Tina Fey) mulls a Midwest move while Jack (Alec Baldwin) plans to wed.

programme.title: Secrets Of A Gold Digger Killer
programme.desc: When Celeste Beards multimillionaire husband was killed by her delusional and disturbed friend Tracey, Celeste was certain she would never be blamed. But Celestes twin daughters discovered the truth and works to bring her to justice.

programme.title: Hope Springs
programme.desc: Arnold and Kay have been married for 30 years, and have drifted apart. To save their marriage, they attend an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A chameleon that aspires to be a swashbuckling hero finds himself in a Western town plagued by bandits and is forced to literally play the role in order to protect it.

programme.title: Secrets Of A Gold Digger Killer
programme.desc: When Celeste Beards multimillionaire husband was killed by her delusional and disturbed friend Tracey, Celeste was certain she would never be blamed. But Celestes twin daughters discovered the truth and works to bring her to justice.

programme.title: Hope Springs
programme.desc: Arnold and Kay have been married for 30 years, and have drifted apart. To save their marriage, they attend an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

programme.title: Eve's Bayou
programme.desc: In 1960s Louisiana a charming physician seems to have it all, but risks everything by indulging in his weakness for attractive women. Exposed by his youngest daughter, can he mend his broken family before it's too late?

programme.title: Snow White And The Huntsman
programme.desc: The one girl threatening the Evil Queens reign has been training in the art of war with the very Huntsman dispatched to kill her. Evil now fights destiny.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: A female paleontologist from New York City heads to Maine where local fish and game officials have discovered a gigantic and deadly 30-foot crocodile that appears to be living in one of the local .akes.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: A former marine and his cash-strapped brother prepare to go head to head in a mixed martial arts battle in order to win the biggest prize ever handed out in the sport. Will the fight force them to finally confront their past, or push them further apart?

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Hunted by a ruthless agent and an army of corrupt cops working for a deadly drug kingpin, Toretto and OConner reunite the gang to pull off one last job - an insane heist worth $100 million!

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: When a Russian Military Convoy is taken down in Moscow, Agent Hobbs goes to the only man who can help him find his target Dominic Toretto.

programme.title: Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and familyare killed by the infamousand elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessedwith revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protg and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.title: Urban Legend
programme.desc: A college student investigates a series of murders that resemble common urban legends.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill
programme.desc: A brutal and realistic war film focuses on the lives of a squad of 14 U.S. Army soldiers in the battle for Hill 937 in the A Shau Valley of Vietnam.

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: Armed and united by the Archangel Michael, a group of strangers become unwitting soldiers on the frontlines of the Apocalypse. Their mission: protect a waitress and her sacred unborn child from the relentless, bloody siege of the demonic legion.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso is a rare book dealer with a taste for the finer things in life. When he is tasked with hunting down a dangerous sorcery book, he finds himself caught up in the chilling world of black magic, where he soon realizes he is out of his depth.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: The world's three best pilots are partnered with a state-of-the-art, fully-automated, pilotless, super stealth warplane - inhuman and invincible. But once in the air, it goes haywire, leaving them with one final mission - bring it down.

programme.title: The Next Three Days
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as a family man with an ideal life who finds his world turned upside down when his wife is convicted of murdering her boss. Convinced of her innocence he decides to break her out of prison, but soon finds himself out of his depth.

programme.desc: A convicted thief poses as a cop in order to retrieve a stolen diamond.

programme.desc: Emptiness - British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the prairies and vast sprawling plains of both Saskatchewon and Alberta provinces and discovers they reveal riches from fossils to farmland.

programme.desc: Umbria - Stanley Tucci visits Umbria, nicknamed the green heart of Italy. From wild boar hunts to incredible black truffle farms, Tucci explores the riches this land has to offer.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S8 Ep8
programme.desc: Chocolate Bars - Gregg Wallace visits an enormous factory in York to learn how millions of peppermint-flavoured bubbly chocolate bars are produced every year.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S8 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland - Ben Fogle meets Denni Karlsson, a former film-maker who has made a home in the highlands of eastern Iceland, and set up a wilderness centre exploring 200 years of local history.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Emptiness - British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the prairies and vast sprawling plains of both Saskatchewon and Alberta provinces and discovers they reveal riches from fossils to farmland.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Jakarta to Borobudur - In the heaving megacity of Jakarta, Michael Portillo uncovers Indonesia's colonial past as part of a Dutch empire and its rich history as a port.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Wild West Ep3
programme.desc: Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Back with the Packs Ep1
programme.desc: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Under Pressure Ep2
programme.desc: As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Karoo Ep4
programme.desc: In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now its a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of troubleboth on land and in the water.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories Ep1
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Surrogate Families Ep1
programme.desc: Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals well meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of troubleboth on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Hunting with the Manzi Ep2
programme.desc: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Herd Mentality Ep2
programme.desc: Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore whats it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Return to the Mara Ep2
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Ngorongoro Ep3
programme.desc: Explores the Ngorogoros highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africas tuskers.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Young Up-Start Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Grass is Greener Ep2
programme.desc: Go on a junk-food-fuelled urban holiday with the Street Troop, then watch the Hill Troops invasion of their turf turn sour. Monitor the Sisterhoods plot to kidnap Saras baby before newly minted alpha Loci discovers his old rival is back in town.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - Clash of the Alphas Ep3
programme.desc: Stand back when a brawl erupts after the Street Troop finds the Hill Troop on their turf. Assess Matnoors poor parenting skills, see alpha wannabe Ajit make his move, then cool off as a heat wave pushes everyone to share the wealth in the forest.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story
programme.desc: March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the worlds 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are natures best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Hunting with the Manzi Ep2
programme.desc: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bees Diary tells that story.

programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - The Missing Manzi Ep3
programme.desc: Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species Ep3
programme.desc: Welcoming new babies at zoos is always great news, but when they belong to a species thats endangered in the wild its very special indeed. From animals that were once near extinction, like the southern white rhino, to Sulawesi macaques that are critically endangered, this episode of Baby Animals reveals what life is like for these animals in the safety of a zoo.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Blue Lagoon Ep5
programme.desc: Nestled on the western coast of South Africa lies an extraordinary cove that is host to an abundance of marine and bird life. It provides ample food and spurs a life cycle that reaches well beyond Africa. This is the Blue Lagoon.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Chobe River Ep6
programme.desc: Deep in southern Africa, a mighty river snakes through untamed wilderness. Its vast flood plains are a magnet for wildlife. In the dry season animals travel great distances to reach this oasis and during droughts space and resources are at a premium. But every animal has its place along the banks of the mighty Chobe river...

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Source to Sea Ep7
programme.desc: All rivers are on a quest, a constant mission to find the ocean, an endless cycle to move water across the vast blue planet. Along the way they support countless lives but their odyssey is by no means easy. From ice to heat, obstacles abound. Yet, despite an ever-changing nature, a river always finds its way - on the journey from Source to Sea.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Wetland Wonder Ep8
programme.desc: Southern Africa is gripped in a punishing drought. Across the region plants and animals are suffering. At times like this water becomes critical survival and wetlands become magnets for life. This film is a celebration of South Africas greatest wetland Lake St Lucia.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bats teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the teams solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend whos ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phils clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinics favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew whos the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbills new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brisbane Floods Ep5
programme.desc: Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Fly Free Ep6
programme.desc: Observe vet Karinas fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinics toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet whos quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - The Missing Manzi Ep3
programme.desc: Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.
